name: search-query-to-text
label: Search Query to Text File
description: This is an SDK gear (ANALYSIS), which, provided with a flyql string (as a configuration parameter), performs a FlyQL query and writes the results out to a file (type configurable).

column_config.description: A JSON file specifying the columns to use in text files

create_json_file.description: whether to create a json file [default = true]

create_csv_file.description: whether to create a csv file [default = true]

return_type.description: Search return type. Must be "session", "acquisition","analysis", or "file"

author: Kaleb Fischer
